title: SA Power Outage
body:
On the 28/09/2016 the South Australian power network went down due to the storms. I was wondering if riot games can revoke any bans and lp lose due to disconnects last night. The power went out at about 3:30, thanks.

~Rockie

replies.body:
Hey there,

Unfortunately the only way losses can be forgiven is if "Loss Prevented" is enabled, this is only enabled during widespread network outages/downtime that affects a large majority of the playerbase as it is shard-wide.

No changes can be made to your LP or Leaverbuster punishments, these systems are designed in this way to prevent taint.
